transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ma'am number de dijiye.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji number note karo.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: 96
Customer: Ek second hold kijiye.
Executive: 96
Customer: 554
Executive: 9654
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji. 77
Customer: 771183
Executive: 1183. Lekin ma'am ye agar aapke boss ka number hai, to lekin unka call
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Chalaate hain IndiaMART ka wohi application dekhte hain, ek baar unse baat karo.
Executive: But ma'am call aapke kis number se aaya tha jis number pe meri baat ho rahi hai? Call kiya kisne?
Customer: Number se unhone call kar di laga di thi ma'am.
Customer: Ab woh nahi hai idhar. Ek baar call kar lo woh apne cabin mein aap unse baat kar lo.
Executive: To ye kaun hai? Ye owner hai? Jiska number aapne diya.
Customer: Nahi nahi owner nahi hai ye. Ye application chalaate hain IndiaMART ki inse baat karo.
Executive: Achcha. Aur IndiaMART ke customer care pe call kisne kiya? Owner ne?
Customer: Nahi nahi owner ne nahi kari thi sir unhone hi kari thi yaar. Bata to rahi hu aapko.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to know who made the call.



Resolution:

- Customer stated someone else made the call.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, number, owner, application
